requirements: Defeat 5 boss nodes in World 2: 南西諸島海域

description: Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy's Northern Fleet
requirements: Defeat 5 bosses in the Northern Sea 3-3, 3-4, or 3-5

Seize Air Superiority on the Southern Sea Coral Islands
requirements: Sortie to 5-2 and get an S-Rank at the boss node 2 times

description: Strive to Ensure the Security of the Marine Transportation Route
requirements: Sortie to 1-5 and get at least an A-rank at the boss node 3 times

description: Increase the Level of Training by Exercising
requirements: Challenge 3 other fleets in Exercises (defeat is ok) within the same day

description: Overwhelm the Other Admirals through Exercises
requirements: Get 5 victories in Exercises within the same day
Get 20 victories in Exercises within the same week
Get 7 victories in Exercises within the same day
Perform 3 successful expeditions within the same day.
Perform 10 successful expeditions within the same day.
Perform 30 successful expeditions within the same week.

description: Complete the Transport Operations towards South
Continue Carrying Out the Rat Transportation (Tokyo Express) towards South
requirements: Complete Expedition 37 or 38 a total of 7 times in a week
Resupply 15 times (1 time is 1 click of the resupply button)
